name: MU Online Image File
summary: Learn about .OZJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Since OZJ is a proprietary format, the file should be converted into a .JPG, .BMP, or .TGA file to be edited by an image editor then converted back into an OZJ file. The OZJ file can be converted using the MU Online Image Converter.
NOTE: Other similar image files used by MU Online are .OZB and .OZT.

description: File created for MU Online, a Korean online multiplayer role-playing game; contains an image used for textures, skins, interface, etc., which are referenced during gameplay.
